msg: Further fix for OLIO-84. This library is now in faban.

author: shanti
msg: Further fixes for OLIO-35. Build script updated to latest faban. New services-tools.xml required

author: boisvert
msg: BUILDR-313: Prevent release with uncommitted_files on Git 1.4.3+

author: shanti
msg: Fix for OLIO-35. Added new services for thin and nginx. The RailsService now captures the
application's environment.rb and production log. It also clears the rails cache at the start of the
run. The Nginx and Thin services support startup/shutdown etc.
The deployment configuration files have been modified to allow the user to set various parameters
